header.name: Khateeb Ur Rehman
header.title: Full Stack Architect & Digital Systems Expert

summary: Senior Full Stack Architect with 5+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance web and mobile applications. Expert in Next.js, React Native, and Cloud Architecture. Proven track record of delivering enterprise-grade solutions that drive business growth and operational efficiency.

description: Architected and led the development of a SaaS platform serving 10k+ users, reducing load times by 40%.
Implemented a microservices architecture using Node.js and Docker, improving system scalability.
Mentored a team of 4 junior developers, conducting code reviews and enforcing best practices.
Developed 15+ custom websites and e-commerce stores for high-ticket clients using Next.js and Shopify.
Integrated complex third-party APIs (Stripe, Twilio, HubSpot) to automate business workflows.
Optimized database queries, reducing server costs by 25%.
Assisted in the development of a React-based dashboard for internal data visualization.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to implement responsive, pixel-perfect interfaces.
Maintained and debugged legacy codebases, resolving 50+ critical bugs.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.details: Graduated with Honors. Capstone Project: AI-driven Traffic Management System.
